TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AVAudioSessionDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required parameters, this class contains methods that allow developers to call the optional methods without forcing implementors to have those methods.
